pageProduct.name: Schick Hydro Stubble Remover Mens Razor Kit 1
pageProduct.description:
General Information

New Schick Hydro Stubble Remover comfortably shaves up to 7 days of stubble with less tug & pull (vs. Schick Hydro 5).

Fits Schick Hydro 5.

  • Stubble Comb aligns hair and helps prevent tugging and pulling
  • Easy Rinse Design helps prevent shaving debris from building up
  • Dermatologist-tested
  • Cushioning Hydrating Gel Pools create a protective barrier for a comfortable shave. With Green Tea
  • With flip-back trimmer for Precise Trimming and hard-to-reach spots

Dermatologist Tested?: Yes

KEY FEATURES

• DESIGNED FOR YOUR COMFORT, NO MATTER HOW OFTEN YOU SHAVE - Comfortably shaves up to 7 days of stubble with less tug & pull*.
• UNIQUE STUBBLE COMB - The unique stubble comb aligns hairs to prevent tugging and pulling.
• DESIGNED FOR MAXIMUM COMFORT AND DERMATOLOGIST TESTED - Our razor features Cushioning Gel Pools leave skin feeling soothed. With Green Tea.
• PROTECT YOUR SKIN AGAINST IRRITATION WITH SCHICK HYDRO STUBBLE REMOVER - Three layers of comfort coating on each blade and skin guards for extra protection and to help protect against irritation.
• EASY-TO-RINSE DESIGN - Helps prevent shaving debris from building up.
• PERFECT YOUR STYLE - With a simple flip, our unique face razor transforms into a precision trimmer for edging and trimming hard-to-reach places. Conveniently switch between shaving and trimming with a simple flip of the thumb.
• *vs. Schick Hydro 5.

Warnings

Blades are sharp tools, handle with care.
Keep away from children.

Ingredients

PEG-115m, Ceramide Ng, Zinc Stearate, Cyclodextrin, Maltodextrin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Camellia Sinensis Leaf, Cocos Nucifera Oil, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocopherol.

Directions

For optimal performance change the cartridge when one or more of the gel pools appear empty.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store razors and blades in a dry environment between use.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Recycle box and tray. arl.org.au

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
